verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <WH6030> vai-Ya-'an spake אֱלִיה֗וּ <WH453> 'e-li-Hu, Elihu וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> vai-yo-Mar. moreover and said

הֲ֭זֹאת <WH2063> Ha-zot you חָשַׁ֣בְתָּ <WH2803> cha-Shav-ta Thinkest לְמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> le-mish-Pat; thou this to be right אָ֝מַ֗רְתָּ <WH559> 'a-Mar-ta, [that] thou saidst צִדְקִ֥י <WH6664> tzid-Ki My righteousness מֵאֵֽל׃ <WH410> me-'El. God

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for תֹ֭אמַר <WH559> To-mar For thou saidst מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What יִּסְכָּן־ <WH5532> yis-kon- What advantage לָ֑ךְ Lach; מָֽה־ <WH4100> mah- What אֹ֝עִ֗יל <WH3276> 'o-'Il, will it be unto thee;[and] What profit מֵֽחַטָּאתִֽי׃ <WH2403> Me-chat-ta-Ti. sin

אֲ֭נִי <WH589> 'A-ni I אֲשִֽׁיבְךָ֣ <WH7725> 'a-shi-ve-Cha break מִלִּ֑ין <WH4405> mil-Lin; answer וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et רֵעֶ֥יךָ <WH7453> re-'Ei-cha thee and thy companions עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> 'im-Mach. with

הַבֵּ֣ט <WH5027> hab-Bet Look שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim unto the heavens וּרְאֵ֑ה <WH7200> u-re-'Eh; and see וְשׁ֥וּר <WH7789> ve-Shur and behold שְׁ֝חָקִ֗ים <WH7834> cha-Kim, the clouds גָּבְה֥וּ <WH1361> ga-ve-Hu [which] are higher מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH4480> mi-Me-ka. than

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If חָ֭טָאתָ <WH2398> Cha-ta-ta If thou sinnest מַה־ <WH4100> mah- what תִּפְעָל־ <WH6466> tif-'ol- what doest בּ֑וֹ bo; וְרַבּ֥וּ <WH7231> ve-rab-Bu be multiplied פְ֝שָׁעֶ֗יךָ <WH6588> fe-sha-'Ei-cha, thou against him;or [if] thy transgressions מַה־ <WH4100> mah- what תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> ta-'a-seh- what doest לּֽוֹ׃ lo.

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If צָ֭דַקְתָּ <WH6663> Tza-dak-ta If thou be righteous מַה־ <WH4100> mah- what תִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> tit-ten- what givest ל֑וֹ lo; א֥וֹ <WH176> o Or מַה־ <WH4100> mah- what מִיָּדְךָ֥ <WH3027> mi-ya-de-Cha He יִקָּֽח׃ <WH3947> yik-Kach. thou him;or what receiveth

לְאִישׁ־ <WH376> le-'ish- [may hurt] a man כָּמ֥וֹךָ <WH3644> ka-Mo-cha like רִשְׁעֶ֑ךָ <WH7562> rish-'E-cha; Thy wickedness וּלְבֶן־ <WH1121> u-le-ven- [may profit] the son אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man צִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH6666> tzid-ka-Te-cha. as thou [art] and thy righteousness

מֵ֭רֹב <WH7230> me-ro By reason of the multitude עֲשׁוּקִ֣ים <WH6217> 'a-shu-Kim of oppressions יַזְעִ֑יקוּ <WH2199> yaz-'I-ku; they make [the oppressed] to cry יְשַׁוְּע֖וּ <WH7768> ye-shav-ve-'U they cry out מִזְּר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> miz-ze-Ro-a' by reason of the arm רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> rab-Bim. of the mighty

וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- no אָמַ֗ר <WH559> 'a-Mar, But none saith אַ֭יֵּה <WH335> 'Ai-yeh how אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> e-Lo-ah Where [is] God עֹשָׂ֑י <WH6213> 'o-Sai; my maker נֹתֵ֖ן <WH5414> no-Ten who giveth זְמִר֣וֹת <WH2158> ze-mi-Rot songs בַּלָּֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> bal-La-ye-lah. in the night

מַ֭לְּפֵנוּ <WH502> Mal-le-fe-nu Who teacheth מִבַּהֲמ֣וֹת <WH929> mib-ba-ha-Mot us more than the beasts אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> 'A-retz; of the earth וּמֵע֖וֹף <WH5775> u-me-'of than the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim air יְחַכְּמֵֽנוּ׃ <WH2449> ye-chak-ke-Me-nu. and maketh us wiser

שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> sham There יִ֭צְעֲקוּ <WH6817> Yitz-'a-ku There they cry וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo does not יַעֲנֶ֑ה <WH6030> ya-'a-Neh; but none giveth answer מִ֝פְּנֵ֗י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei, because גְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> ge-'on of the pride רָעִֽים׃ <WH7451> ra-'Im. of evil men

אַךְ־ <WH389> 'a-cho-Sha- Surely שָׁ֭וְא <WH7723> v vanity לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor יִשְׁמַ֥ע׀ <WH8085> yish-Ma' will not hear אֵ֑ל <WH410> 'El; Surely God וְ֝שַׁדַּ֗י <WH7706> ve-shad-Dai, neither will the Almighty לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo Nor יְשׁוּרֶֽנָּה׃ <WH7789> ye-shu-Ren-nah. regard

אַ֣ף <WH637> 'af Although כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- when תֹ֭אמַר <WH559> To-mar thou sayest לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not תְשׁוּרֶ֑נּוּ <WH7789> te-shu-Ren-nu; thou shalt not see דִּ֥ין <WH1779> din him [yet] judgment לְ֝פָנָ֗יו <WH6440> le-fa-Nav, [is] before וּתְח֥וֹלֵֽל <WH2342> u-te-Cho-lel him therefore trust לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah, and now כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- because אַ֭יִן <WH369> 'A-yin has not פָּקַ֣ד <WH6485> pa-Kad But now because [it is] not [so] he hath visited אַפּ֑וֹ <WH639> ap-Po; in his anger וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- Nor יָדַ֖ע <WH3045> ya-Da' yet he knoweth בַּפַּ֣שׁ <WH6580> bap-Pash extremity מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. [it] not in great

וְ֭אִיּוֹב <WH347> Ve-'i-yov Therefore doth Job הֶ֣בֶל <WH1892> He-vel in vain יִפְצֶה־ <WH6475> yif-tzeh- open פִּ֑יהוּ <WH6310> Pi-hu; his mouth בִּבְלִי־ <WH1097> biv-li- without דַ֝֗עַת <WH1847> Da-'at, knowledge מִלִּ֥ין <WH4405> mil-Lin words יַכְבִּֽר׃ <WH3527> yach-Bir. he multiplieth פ Peh
